title: Ayodhya

coverImg.altText: The ‘Kanak Bhawan’ is the one of the most importantemples in Ayodhya dedicated to Lord Ram and his divine consort Sita.

summary: Ayodhya is a city located in Faizabad district of Uttar Pradesh. The city is identified with the legendary city of Ayodhya, and as such, is the birthplace of Rama and setting of the epic Ramayana.
